sent.orig: Secondly a robotic sample preparation instrument has been optimized for the amino acid derivatization.
sent.trans: 其次，自动化的氨基酸样品制备仪器已经得到优化。

sent.orig: Secondly, it caused the left river bank of Wuliu Channel's downstream to produce recirculation region.
sent.trans: 另一方面造成五六渠泄水槽下游的大河左岸形成一定范围的回流区。

sent.orig: Secondly, some leading indicators of macro-economic departments turn for the better.
sent.trans: 二是部分宏观经济部门先行指标转好。

sent.orig: Secondly, it introduces universal lamp holder.
sent.trans: 介绍一种通用型光源灯座。

sent.orig: Secondly, the governmentachievement evaluating and appraising system neglects environmental improvement of water.
sent.trans: 二是政府政绩考核评价体系中忽视了水环境治理。
